titleStmt.title: Go in peace. Containing some brief directions for young ministers, in their visitation of the sick Useful for the people, in their state both of health, and sickness.
titleStmt.author: Martin, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A. M. for Richard Royston, bookseller to his most sacred Majesty, a the Angel in Amen-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Martin by Wing.
With a final leaf of advertisement.
Reproduction of the original at the Cambridge University Library.
